Question: Valens Semiconductor CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Valens Semiconductor

Product: CES 2024 Showcase

- Unprecedented EMC Performance with high-performance chipsets demonstrating superior noise immunity
- Industry Leading Link Distance with A-PHY Gear2, 4Gbps over 40 meters Coax
- Advanced Time Synchronization with extremely accurate clock and frame sync, including Pulse Width Modulator (PWM) for safety-critical systems
- Centralized Processing for True Sensor Fusion with VA7000 chipset series for fast controls in transitioning to centralized processing
- Professional Grade USB3.2 Extension (VS6320) for extension of high-performance USB3.2 Gen1 peripherals at up to 100 meters/328 feet
- MIPI A-PHY Ecosystem showcasing diverse, high-speed standardized sensor connectivity for centralized processing

Valens Semiconductor showcased its high-performance connectivity solutions at CES 2024, featuring innovations in in-vehicle connectivity, USB3.2 extension, and MIPI A-PHY compliant VA7000 chipset series.
Summary_cn:
Valens半导体

产品：CES 2024展示

-史无前例的电磁兼容性能，高性能芯片组展示出卓越的抗干扰能力
-行业领先的链路距离，采用A-PHY Gear2，在40米同轴电缆上达到4Gbps传输速率
-先进的时间同步，具有极高的时钟和帧同步精度，包括用于安全关键系统的PWM（脉宽调制器）
-真正的传感器融合的集中处理，采用VA7000芯片组系列，实现快速控制，过渡到集中处理
-专业级USB3.2扩展（VS6320），可将高性能USB3.2 Gen1外围设备扩展至100米/328英尺
-MIPI A-PHY生态系统展示了多样化、高速标准化传感器连接，用于集中处理

Valens半导体在CES 2024展示了其高性能连接解决方案，包括车载连接、USB3.2扩展和符合MIPI A-PHY的VA7000芯片组系列的创新技术。
